text: LA-6 is a constituency of Azad Kashmir Legislative Assembly which is currently represented by the Chaudhary Ali Shan Sohni of Pakistan People's Party. It covers the area of Samahni Tehsil in Bhimber District of Azad Kashmir, Pakistan. ==Election 2016== elections were held in this constituency on 21 July 2016. Category:Bhimber District Category:Government of Azad Kashmir Category:Constituencies of Pakistan
title: Constituency LA-6
